function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Estimation of COVID-19 cases based on sewer network connections","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of cases and prevalence","Mitigation":"Use additional data sources for validation, account for uncertainties in distribution","Technologies":"Data analysis, statistical modeling","People":"Residents connected to the sewer network","Owner":"Local health authorities"},{"Description":"Poor removal of SARS-CoV-2 in conventional WWTP","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 through wastewater","Mitigation":"Upgrade treatment plants, implement advanced treatment methods","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Residents in the catchment area","Owner":"Environmental regulatory agencies, wastewater treatment authorities"}]}
